description: Marine Headquarters, the primary base of operations for the Marines and home to the Fleet Admiral and the three Admirals. Preparing to execute Portgas D. Ace and defend against Whitebeard's forces.

keyEvents.title: The Three Admirals Assemble at Marineford
keyEvents.description: All three Marine Admirals - Aokiji, Kizaru, and Akainu - are assembled and ready for the upcoming war at Marineford, representing the full might of the Marine forces.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the incredible defensive force prepared to face Whitebeard, with three of the most powerful individuals in the One Piece world standing together.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Approaches Marineford
keyEvents.description: Luffy and his allies aboard the stolen Marine warship continue their approach to Marineford, determined to rescue Ace.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the inevitable clash between Luffy's rescue mission and the assembled Marine forces.

statusHistory.reason: Preparing for the execution of Ace and the coming war with Whitebeard
